name: FilterInterface

members.name: name
members.description: A unique key used to identify the filter

members.name: filter
members.description: The markup for the given filter

members.name: shortcut
members.description: Whether or not the filter should have a shortcut popover displayed

members.name: pinned
members.description: Whether or not the filter should be pinned, permanently displaying the filter

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether or not the filter is disabled

members.name: hideClearButton
members.defaultValue:
false
Whether or not the clear button is displayed

members.name: onAction
members.description: Optional callback when filter is pressed

members.name: section
members.description: Optional section heading that this filter will go under

members.name: hidden
members.description: Optional: hides the filter from the dropdown
